name: MonitoredJMeterLoadTest
description: Runs a JMeter cloud load test and monitors assertions
author: nsavas@microsoft.com
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Pipelines Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a previously registered service connection to talk to the cloud-based load test service. Choose 'Manage' to register a new service connection.

inputs.name: TestDrop
inputs.label: Apache JMeter test files folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the root of the repository where the load test files are located.

inputs.name: LoadTest
inputs.label: Apache JMeter file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Apache JMeter test filename to be used under the load test folder specified above.

inputs.name: agentCount
inputs.label: Agent Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of test agents (dual-core) used in the run.

inputs.name: runDuration
inputs.label: Run Duration (sec)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Load test run duration in seconds.

inputs.name: ThresholdLimit
inputs.label: Number of permissible threshold violations.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of threshold violations above which the load test outcome is considered unsuccessful. A violation occurs when a JMeter assertion fails or a sample is marked as failed.

inputs.name: geoLocation
inputs.label: Load Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Geographical region to generate the load from.
